short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closer browser extension enables one-click link sharing and faster screen sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our Closer browser lets you share links instantly with other people you're talking to with One Click. We think it is just magically fast.

In addition to that, does the extension speed up the time to get screen sharing going as we will get everything started with the press of the existing screen share button for you.
